article.headline: Charting a bullish holding pattern, S&P 500 traverses higher plateau
article.body: U.S. stocks are mixed early Friday, largely treading water amid receding volatility. Against this backdrop, the S&P 500 has asserted a higher plateau — capped by next resistance (3,233) — while the Dow Jones Industrial Average digests a decisive early-week break atop its 200-day moving average. Before detailing the U.S. markets’ wider view,...
